data.title: 300+ Customer Service Representative Jobs, Employment in Savage, MN August 9, 2024
data.meta_description: 307 Customer Service Representative jobs available in Savage, MN on Indeed.com. Apply to Customer Service Representative, Customer Specialist, Client Services Associate and more!
data.text:
Under the direction of the Health & Human Services (HHS) Office Manager, the Health & Human Services (HHS) Administrative Representative is responsible for the HHS front desk by screening and directing callers and face-to-face customers to appropriate staff/units. The HHS Administrative Representative must possess excellent customer service skills while multi-tasking. This position handles sensitive, highly confidential information. This position provides support to external customers by copying, prepping/scanning/indexing many types of documents. The HHS Administrative Representative is also responsible for providing clerical support to internal customers by processing mail, copying documents, send/receive faxes, and prepping/scanning/indexing many types of documents, and maintaining and updating various department records, forms, manuals, brochures or informational packets. This position also performs varied administrative duties, including creating and maintaining departmental spreadsheets and other relevant files.

This position will work Monday through Friday, 8:00-4:30, onsite at the Chaska Government Center.
